Event.EventName: The person using the cash machine before you just sneezed into their hands and continues to use the cash machine.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Once they have finished, use the cash machine.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: By using the cash machine you have increased your chance of catching the virus.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Once they have finished, ask someone to clean the cash machine before you use it.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: By getting the cash machine cleaned you have reduced your chance of catching the virus.
